# Load/Store Instructions Test
# SW x2, 0(x0) (Store x2 to mem[0])
00000000001000000010000000100011
# NOP (ADDI x0, x0, 0) - avoid hazard
00000000000000000000000000010011
# NOP
00000000000000000000000000010011
# NOP
00000000000000000000000000010011
# LW x22, 20(x0) (Load from mem[5] to x22)
00000001010000000010101100000011
